en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
gd:
Thig còmhla ris na ceudan de luchd-rannsachaidh bho air feadh
           an saoghal a tha nam pàirt den choimhearsnachd Open Specy le
           a ’dèanamh anailis, a’ roinneadh, a ’giullachd, agus a’ comharrachadh
           an spectra Raman agus IR aca. Tha na seirbheisean sin an-asgaidh agus stòr fosgailte le taing do ar com-pàirtichean:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
gd:
Gu h-aithghearr: Gus an inneal a chleachdadh luchdaich suas faidhle csv, asp, jdx, spc, no spà chun taba faidhle luchdaidh suas.
                                  Ma tha csv, bu chòir aon cholbh a bhith air ainmeachadh mar ‘wavenumber’ (ann an aonadan 1 / cm) agus fear eile air ainmeachadh mar ‘dian’.
                                  Faodaidh tu an dàta agad a dhèanamh rèidh le bhith a ’cleachdadh criathrag SG, bun-loidhne a’ ceartachadh an dàta agad le bhith a ’cleachdadh òrdugh polynomial iModPolyFit, agus a’ cuingealachadh raon nan tonnan airson a ’ghèam.
                                  Thèid an toradh a choimeas ri leabharlann spectra Raman no FTIR a-staigh. Na 1000 geamannan as làidire còmhla ri do
                                  thèid dàta a chaidh a luchdachadh suas no a phròiseasadh a thaisbeanadh ann an cuilbheart agus clàr eadar-ghnìomhach. Airson tuilleadh fiosrachaidh cliog air a ’phutan gu h-ìosal
                                  no coimhead air a ’bhidio stiùiridh mionaideach.

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
gd:
Chaidh spectra iomraidh fhaighinn bho stòrasan ruigsinneachd fosgailte
           air-loidhne, foillseachaidhean ath-sgrùdaichte le co-aoisean, agus tabhartasan corporra. San àm ri teachd
           thèid spectra a thèid a luchdachadh suas don inneal a thoirt a-steach don iomradh
           leabharlann gus a dhèanamh eadhon nas fheàrr.

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
gd:
Gus spectra a cho-roinn luchdaich suas faidhle chun taba faidhle luchdaich suas. Ma thagh thu Co-roinn thèid leth-bhreac den spectra agad a chuir chun Choimhearsnachd
           Bathar dàta air Frèam Saidheans Fosgailte. Gus meata-dàta a bharrachd a chur ris,
           lìon na raointean meata-dàta avaliable agus cliog -Share Data-. Tha an
           Thèid lethbhreac a dhèanamh den fhaidhle spectra a luchdaich thu suas còmhla ris na freagairtean agad
           chun an fho-phasgan -With Metadata aig a ’cheangal gu h-ìosal. Bidh a h-uile dàta co-roinnte a ’cumail
           Ceadachas Attribution Creative Commons 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
gd:
Thathas a ’dèanamh deuchainn air a h-uile paramadair san inneal seo gus sin a dhearbhadh
           tha an inneal ag obair cho math ‘s a ghabhas agus a’ dearbhadh an roghainn as fheàrr
           paramadairean ri chleachdadh. Tha an obair dearbhaidh gnàthach againn a ’toirt a-steach ceartachadh
           tagraidhean dùblaichte anns na leabharlannan iomraidh, a ’sgrùdadh airson spectra a-steach
           meata-dàta nach eil anns an leabharlann speactram, agus a ’dèanamh cinnteach gu bheil e àbhaisteach
           bheir paramadairean seachad cruinneas 80% anns a ’chiad gheama.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
gd: Ùrachaidhean, Iarrtasan Feart, agus Aithisgean Bug

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
gd: Bidh sinn a ’cumail sùil air gach ùrachadh le bhith a’ cleachdadh smachd dreach air a ’chòd againn. Faodar feartan iarraidh agus aithris air bug air GitHub.

en: Follow us on Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com to be added to the mailing list.
gd: Lean sinn air Twitter @OpenSpecy. Cuir post-d gu wincowger@gmail.com ri chur ris an liosta puist.

en: Free FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software
gd: Bathar-bog FTIR an-asgaidh: bathar-bog aithneachaidh speactram IR siople microplastic

en: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy from ThermoFisher
gd: Acadamaidh Ionnsachaidh Spectroscopy an-asgaidh bho ThermoFisher

en: Free Optical Microscopy Learning Resource from Florida State University
gd: Goireas ionnsachaidh microscopy optigeach an-asgaidh bho Oilthigh Stàite Florida

en: Free desktop application for spectral analysis and links to reference databases.
gd: Iarrtas deasg an-asgaidh airson mion-sgrùdadh speactram agus ceanglaichean gu stòran-dàta iomraidh.
Luchdaich suas, coimhead, agus co-roinn Spectra

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
gd:
Ma thogras tu, bidh sinn a ’roinn na speuclairean agus na roghainnean agad leis a’ choimhearsnachd speactroscopaidh.
           Gu gnàthach, thèid an dàta gu lèir a cheadachadh fo Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Nochdaidh speuclairean luchdaichte an seo: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
gd:
Luchdaich suas faidhlichean speactram Raman no FTIR mar csv, jdx, spc, no spà. Is fheàrr faidhle csv. Mas e csv a th ’ann, feumaidh aon cholbh a bhith air a chomharrachadh leis an ainm‘ wavenumber ’ann an aonadan de (1 / cm) agus colbh eile le ainm‘ déine ’ann an aonadan ionsú.
            Ma tha jdx, spc, spa, no 0 bu chòir don fhaidhle a bhith na aon speactram ionsachaidh le wavenumber a-steach (1 / cm). Cha bhith na faidhlichean sin an-còmhnaidh ag obair gu foirfe oir tha iad duilich an leughadh agus mar sin dèan sgrùdadh dùbailte orra ann am bathar-bog eile.
            Buail air a ’phutan‘ Dàta Deuchainn ’gus sampall de Raman a luchdachadh sìos.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
gd:
Mura h-eil an speactram a chaidh a luchdachadh suas ann an aonadan sùghaidh,
           cleachd an cur-a-steach seo gus na h-aonadan a shònrachadh gus tionndadh bho.Open Specy can
           atharraich spectra reflectance no transmittance gu aonadan Absorbance a ’cleachdadh
           bidh seo a ’tuiteam sìos anns a’ phutan faidhle luchdaich suas. A h-uile gin de na tabaichean roimhe
           gabhail ris gu bheil an dàta ann an aonadan sùghaidh mar sin bu chòir dhut an
           ceartachadh mus lean thu air adhart ma tha feum air. An atharrachadh transmittance
           a ’cleachdadh an àireamhachadh log10 (1 / T) nach eil ceart airson an t-siostam
           agus feartan mìrean. Bidh an atharrachadh meòrachaidh a ’cleachdadh an
           Co-aontar Kubelka-Munk (1-R) 2 / (2 * R). Tha sinn a ’gabhail ris gu bheil am faileas
           air a chruth mar cheudad bho 1-100 agus an toiseach ceartaich an dian le bhith a ’roinneadh le 100
           gus am bi e a ’freagairt ris an fhoirm ris a bheil dùil aig a’ cho-aontar.
           Mura h-eil gin air a thaghadh, tha Open Specy a ’gabhail ris gu bheil an dàta a chaidh a luchdachadh suas
           speactram absorbance.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
gd: Is e seo speactram sampaill a ghabhas luchdachadh suas chun inneal airson deuchainn a dhèanamh air agus tuigse fhaighinn air mar a bu chòir na faidhlichean csv a bhith air an cruth.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
gd:
Bidh sinn a ’roinn spectra agus meata-dàta sam bith a chaidh a luchdachadh suas leis a’ choimhearsnachd speactroscopaidh ma lìonas tu na meata-dàta an seo agus tagh cuibhreann.
           Nochdaidh spectra agus meata-dàta luchdaichte an seo: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
gd: Luchdaich suas cuid de dhàta gus tòiseachadh ...

en: Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
gd: Smooth, bun-loidhne ceart, agus luchdaich sìos spectra pròiseasaichte

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
gd: Is dòcha gum bi cuid de luchd-cleachdaidh airson leth-bhreac den speactram pròiseasaichte aca a shàbhaladh. Bidh am putan seo a ’luchdachadh sìos an speactram giullaichte mar fhaidhle csv.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
gd: Faodaidh an socair seo an co-mheas eadar fuaim is fuaim an dàta adhartachadh agus bidh e a ’cleachdadh sìoltachan Savitzky-Golay le 12 puingean dàta ruith agus am polynomial a chaidh a shònrachadh.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
gd: Tha dà roghainn aig a ’chleachdadh ceartachaidh bun-loidhne seo airson ceartachadh bun-loidhne, 1) an dòigh-obrach polynomial imodpolyfit gus bun-loidhne an speactram a lorg le bhith a’ cleachdadh suidheachadh polynomial gu sgìre iomlan an spectra. 2) faodar loidhnichean làimhe a tharraing a ’cleachdadh an inneal loidhne air a’ phlota agus cleachdaidh am putan ceart na loidhnichean gus a ’bhun-loidhne a thoirt air falbh.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
gd: Faodaidh a bhith a ’cuingealachadh an raon speactram roinnean de speactram a thoirt air falbh far nach eil stùcan ann agus maids a leasachadh

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
gd: Comharraich speactram a ’cleachdadh an leabharlann fiosrachaidh

en: This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
gd: Bidh an taghadh seo a ’dearbhadh a bheil an leabharlann maidsidh FTIR no Raman air a chleachdadh. Tagh an seòrsa speactram a chaidh a luchdachadh suas.
Spectrum gus sgrùdadh a dhèanamh air cuideachadh

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
gd: Bidh an taghadh seo a ’dearbhadh a bheil an speactram a chaidh a luchdachadh suas (gun a bhith air a phròiseasadh) no an speactram a tha air a phròiseasadh a’ cleachdadh an tab giollachd air a chleachdadh anns a ’gheama speactram.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
gd: Bidh an taghadh seo a ’dearbhadh a bheil an leabharlann a tha thu a’ maidseadh a ’toirt a-steach làn speactram no dìreach binnean speactram.

en: Help us reach our goal of revolutionizing spectroscopy.
gd: Cuidich sinn le ar n-amas a bhith a ’cruth-atharrachadh speactroscopaidh.

en: A paid team that is pushing Open Specy closer to the ultimate goal of 100% accurate spectral identification and deep spectral diagnostics with a single click
gd: Sgioba pàighte a tha a ’putadh Open Specy nas fhaisge air an amas mu dheireadh de chomharrachadh speactram cruinn 100% agus breithneachadh domhainn speactram le aon bhriogadh

en: A single paid staff person working to update and build the community and the tool
gd: Aon neach-obrach pàighte ag obair gus a ’choimhearsnachd agus an inneal ùrachadh agus a thogail

en: Maintenance costs and minor ad-hoc updates and bug fixes
gd: Cosgaisean cumail suas agus ùrachaidhean beaga ad-hoc agus rèiteachadh bug

en: Keeping the app online and essential maintenance
gd: A ’cumail na h-aplacaid air-loidhne agus cumail suas riatanach

en: Thank you for sharing your data!
gd: Tapadh leibh airson an dàta agad a cho-roinn!

en: Your data will soon be available at https://osf.io/stmv4/
gd: Bidh an dàta agad ri fhaighinn a dh'aithghearr aig https://osf.io/stmv4/

en:
Uploaded data type is not currently supported; please
                      check tooltips and 'About' tab for details.
gd:
Chan eil taic ri seòrsa dàta a chaidh a luchdachadh suas an-dràsta; mas e do thoil e
                      thoir sùil air molaidhean innealan agus tab 'About' airson mion-fhiosrachadh.

en:
If you uploaded a text/csv file, make sure that the 
           columns are numeric and named 'wavenumber' and 
           'intensity'.
gd:
Ma luchdaich thu suas faidhle teacsa / csv, dèan cinnteach gu bheil an
           tha colbhan àireamhach agus air an ainmeachadh ‘wavenumber’ agus
           'dian'.
